page.title: 10WAXWORKS STORE WOOKEY HOLE
page.content:
WHEN MADAME TUSSAUD'S BOUGHT WOOKEY HOLE CAVES AND MILL IN 1973,THE OLD DRYING LOFTS WERE USED AS A STORE ROOM. AFTER A HEAD IS MADE IN LONDON,THE MOULD IS SENT DOWN TO WOOKEY HOLE. IF A HEAD NEEDS RENEWING IN LONDON IT IS GIVEN TO THE MADAME TUSSAUD'S MOULDERS WHO COLLECT THE HEAVY PLASTER MOULD NEGATIVE TO CAST ANOTHER. IT IS VERY RARELY THAT A HEAD GOES BACK TO LONDON FOR REMOULDING AS THE HEADS ON THE SHELVES ARE KEPT FOR REFERENCE ONLY.
FAMOUS HEADS FROM THE PAST INCLUDE LORD NELSON, W.G.GRACE, LAWRENCE OF ARABIA AND A HOST OF RECENT AND PAST POLITICIANS.
